title: Subject and Course Guides: HON 201: Plant Medicine from Rainforest to Metropolis - A Legacy for the Future: Resources
author: Tina Griffin
description: Subject and Course Guides: HON 201: Plant Medicine from Rainforest to Metropolis - A Legacy for the Future: Resources
cleaned_text: We recommend using the latest version of IE11, Edge, Chrome, Firefox or Safari. On Ethnobotany and Herbal Medicine On the Research and Use of Medicinal Plants General reference books For Biological Sciences For History For Anthropology The research guides below will provide further guidance regarding navigation and use of information resources in specific disciplines. If your research question focuses on specific aspects of ethnobotany, anthropology, complementary medicine, geography or maps, Native American studies, or other subjects emphasized in the guides below, it may be helpful to explore the resources highlighted in those guides for further specificity.
